website_summaries.verdict: Great traditional look, which is practical for replacing fixtures in older homes.
pros: Charming sink that provides a basic and practical choice at a good price
It fits well in a small bathroom and has a deep enough bowl to be practical
cons: Fits to the wall slightly differently than it's counterpart from other decades

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink and nice price.
customer_reviews.text: The sink is just the right size for my small bathroom and looks great. The bowl is nice and deep and the sink is not tiny. A nice medium size. Very reasonable price and delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mordue

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sink. It looks good and acts like a sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: very nice sink
customer_reviews.text: very nice quality sink - wish the overflow hole were not so prominent
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L Knauss

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the size we needed. It works well and cleans easily. It arrived quickly and was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Hamsen

customer_reviews.title: Great price...great sink
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sink for a restroom in one of our commercial rentals. I needed one that was ADA compliant and was having a hard time finding one locally. Found this one on Amazon at a great price. I ordered it and recieved it in 2 days. Good quality and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C. Goodner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and was a perfect replacement for the previous sink, which I couldn't remove the trap from. May order for another bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: American Standard 0321.026.020 Declyn 4-Inch Centerset Wall Mount Sink, White
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. It was a replacement sink for my brother's camp; which is 20 miles away from the nearest ( small town) hardware store. It arrived in 2 days with prime shipping and was delivered in excellent condition. Well packed in protective styrofoam blocks. Unfortunately the space was measured incorrectly and the sink did not fit so, needed to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: irish-iez

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: The sink fits perfectly and really updates the 50's bathroom. Size, depth, looks great with new, updated faucets, few installment issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Good Sink
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for clients ADA bath. The shipping was good, product arrived undamaged. Sink was easy for plumber to install. Clients like the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Squier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and fits perfectly in the limited space we have.
customer_reviews.author: West E.

product_meta.title: American Standard 0321.026.020 Declyn 4-Inch Centerset Wall Mount Sink, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteThis item is a american standard 0321.026.020 declyn 4-inch centerset wall mount sink, white . Purpose of use for plumbing fixtures, bath faucets and accessories. This product is manufactured in mexico.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The American Standard Declyn Vitreous China Wall-Mount Lavatory Sink is designed with rear overflow. It comes with the wall hanger, integral faucet ledge and includes a soap depression. The sink is designed for faucet holes on 4" centers. Sink Dimensions: 19" x 17"; Bowl Sizes: 14-1/4" wide, 10-3/4" front-to-back, and 6" deep.
